name: Omar Faruk Mujahid
talk: This course was short but very informative and very helpful for an aspiring leader like myself. It also helped me understand how to view or understand when I receive feedback. I highly recommend it!!

name: Kamal Hassan
talk: This course was short but very informative and very helpful for an aspiring leader like myself. It also helped me understand how to view or understand when I receive feedback. I highly recommend it!!

name: Omar Hassan
talk: I enjoyed the course and learned a lot from it. The content is well organised and focused on practical situations. I particularly enjoyed the bits of psychological research shared in the content.

name: Naimul Islam
talk: nice explanation of the videos. visually attractive and descriptive. questions were great as well. learnt a lot of stuff. teaches you what, when, where, why, and how to give correct feedback

name: Shohel Rana
talk: there are so much use cases that i can apply in my life. thanks so much for giving the psychology know how into the lecture to help us in understanding the root course

name: Jhosim Uddin Khan
talk: The course is very to the point and has a good structure. It does not only teach you how to provide proper feedback, but also how to provide feedback to different type of employees.

name: Danesh Khan
talk: â€‹I learned a lot from this course. It gave the psychological background in addition to instructions in how to give feedback. Learning the Why made me understand the What so much better.

name: Babu Hassan
talk: Great Course. I love the way it is designed, delivered. I learned a lot. The most imporatnt part is that I enjoy every bit of the session and completed everything less than a week. :)

name: Amirul Islam
talk: Giving Helpful Feedback takes a very practical approach to giving feedback . The content  and delivery style were easy to follow. the suggestions can be applied in a number of situations that where you challenged with providing feedback.

name: Kazi Hayat
talk: It concise and direct to the point however see this more of western oriented and may not always be applicable to Asian culture such as the Philippines. Nonetheless, I find it helpful.
